features: 【32GB Flash Drives 10 Pack】 32GB USB drive pack with 10 lanyards, Can be rotated 360 degrees, detailed design makes it easy to use and carry

【Store and Protect Data】 Go through a rigorous quality control process, the USB drive bulk 32GB has a mature appearance and stable high-standard storage technology, which helps us to protect our data from loss.

【Plug and Play】No need to install any software, the USB memory bulk supports Windows/Linux/Mac OS and is compatible with USB 2.0 and below. Plug it into a USB port and works fast. The read speed is 15-20mbp/s, and the write speed is about 10mbp/s.
【Easy to Carry】The frosted and metal cover can prevent fingerprints, The USB pendrive 10 pack 32 GB has a hole design to hang it on a lanyard or key chain,

【Widely Used】Widely used in schools, businesses, photography, media, and so on. The flash drive Pack can be used as a gift for birthdays/teacher's days/children's days/various conferences and exhibitions.

productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 556 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: USB Storage Flash Drive Bulk Need Attention： 1. Capacity Variation: Some of the capacity listed on the USB jump drive bulk is for formatting or basic operation so the actual storage capacity is 91%-93% of the labeled capacity. 2. Data Format and Compatible Systems: The default format of a memorias USB bulk with a capacity of 32 GB or less is FAT32. When copying files larger than 4 GB, it is formatted as exFAT. Memory stick bulk is compatible with Windows, NTFS, and Mac OS read/write. 3. Transfer speed performance of the zip drive USB bulk may vary by capacity depending on the host device, file attributes, and other factors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work for me and the price is fair.
reviews.reviewText: I needed to provide a bunch of paperwork and information to someone, and using a simple and inexpensive USB drive was the perfect solution. It was incredibly simple to put the files on the drive. I did not encounter any issues or errors, and when I checked to make sure everything transferred, it was all there. I didn't need to do anything to prep or format the drives, they were ready to go right out of the box.Both drives have a smooth matte finish to the cover (which I love) and they are in attractive colors of blue and black. I appreciate that they aren't the same color so that if you needed to differentiate between them, you could. I was also able to write a name on the cover in metallic permanent marker, and I liked knowing I was only putting marker on the case, not on the drive itself, so there's no risk of damaging it. The case spins around to expose to the usb, so there's no risk of losing a lid. The packge includes small, simple lanyards that can easily be installed if needed.I think getting two USB drives with this much storage for the price is an excellent deal and I'm glad that I grabbed a set, as it's always good to have a few of these on hand. You never know when you're going to need one, and these are inexpensive enough to have on hand for whenever you may need them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Functional, Basic USB Storage
reviews.reviewText: These 64 GB USB jump drives are basic and functional. They come with easily attached lanyards to reduce likelihood of loss. Using Disk Utility, I erased and reformatted both of them before use. Prior to this, the drives showed 3 MB in use but after erasure and reformat, 1.6 MB in use. They seem fine and are handy to have. No complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The lanyards are a nice touch
reviews.reviewText: The flash drives work nicely with no problems. The lanyards are a nice touch because they allow you to hang the drives on a hook, around your neck, or wherever to keep them handy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ready to go USB drives
reviews.reviewText: These 64GB USB drives are formatted as FAT32, making them ready to go as bootable drives I can use with Rufus to install a custom OS. I needed to delete a partition and used the second drive in this set of two to run the software right from BIOS, as the M.2 drive I was dealing with had no OS on it. These USB drives are ready to use out of the box for both storage and running a portable OS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just what I needed. I needed this for a class and it came in clutch. Stored everything I needed and then some. I haven't had any compatibility issues or any files getting lost, so that's a major plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Transferring .mkv video files with the average size of 700MB eachI never got a stable transfer speed it kept bouncing between22 and 52 MBs Came formatted out at 58.5 gig in the exFAT format. NTFSformat was the same. Tried transferring the same files formattedin NTFS and got the same yo-yo transfer rate but 2MBs slower. At the time of this review a pair of these were 12.99 USD.Not a bad price for what you get. Transfer speeds definitelybetter than USB 2.0 speeds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These seem like good thumb drives, but it's dishonest to label them as 64GB. The 2 drives I received are both 58.4GB, or about 9% smaller than advertised, not a trivial amount. That said, they do work OK, and I haven't had any issues with writing to or reading from these drives. I will use them for periodic long-term backup for my laptop. An OK product except for the exaggerated size, so I give them 4 stars instead of 5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No caps to lose
reviews.reviewText: This USB comes with a strap. It is light and easy to carry, and the strap, though small, makes it easy to find in a bag.The cap is a sliding type, so you never lose just the cap.I like the look and the matte finish.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They do exactly what they say they do

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After a couple of hours of using the first device, it failed, and became unreadable. It was plugged into my laptop the same way I do all my other USB devices, but it irretrievably corrupted the data and could not be subsequently read. The other two devices were (or at least seemed to be) OK.
